item.title: Update map?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

When I use the staircase in wizards tower for Devolution, it was all fucked up.

Bottom line, I have another problem now.

I need to update the map I think. Here’s my code for first stair case (leading to second floor of wizards guild)

} else if (objectID == 1722) { heightLevel = 1; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = 3092; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; stairDistance = 3; stairDistanceAdd = 1;

The only problem with that is, when I go upstairs it doesn’t show the map! It shows the bottom floor, not the second floor. If I log out and in, it will show the second floor.

Also, when I go to first floor from second floor, here’s my code:

} else if (objectID == 1723) { heightLevel = 0; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = 3088; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; stairDistance = 2; stairDistanceAdd = 2;

It doesn’t show the map at all here. It just shows npcs and everything else is black.

… :\ I’m stumped, help!

Read full topic
